actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 162(e)(2) (relating to limitations on the deductibility of trade or business expenses in connection with appearances, etc., with respect to legislation) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the prohibition placed on income tax deductions for expenses incurred in attempting to influence the general public on legislative matters, elections, or referendums.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 162(e)(2) (relating to limitations on the deductibility of trade or business expenses in connection with appearances, etc., with respect to legislation) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
